text: Izabela Vidovic (born ) is an American actress and singer. She is best known for her roles in movies Homefront, Wonder, and in the Freeform television series The Fosters. == Early life == Izabela Vidovic was born in Chicago, Illinois, to Croatian parents Mario and Elizabeta Vidović (née Bašić). Her mother is a filmmaker, actress and writer, born to Croats who moved to the Bosnian village of Busovača. Izabela speaks Croatian. Vidovic started performing in stage productions by the time she was seven, appearing in Mary Poppins, Camp Rock, and Annie. She moved onto film and television productions in 2011. She has a younger sister named Katarina Vidovic == Career == Vidovic has appeared in several series on The CW. In 2013, she played Charlotte on The 100 in the first season episodes "Murphy’s Law" and "Earth Kills". In 2017, Vidovic played a young Kara Danvers / Kara Zor-El in the Supergirl season 3 flashback episode "Midvale". In 2018, she had a multi-episode arc in the fourth season of iZombie as Isobel. In 2017, she played the lead character's sister Olivia in the film Wonder.
